title: Asus_Eee_901_904_1000_linux_DVDimage_Rev1.1_Swedish
description:
Here's a DVD image (Nero image) of an Asus Eee Linux installation in swedish.

From the manual, it is told to support Asus Eee 901, 904 and 1000.

You'll need an external USB DVD drive to install the Linux OS.


1. Attach the USB DVD drive to the Eee and insert the Linux Eee DVD.

2. Turn on the Eee and press <ESC> at boot up to enter the boot loader

3. Select USB: XXXXXXXX to boot from USB DVD

4. Follow on-screen instructions
